body.p: The following requirements must be met in order to use Mibble:
All required JAR files are provided in the lib subdirectory:

item.title: mibble-parser-.jar
item.text: The parser library and app code

item.title: mibble-mibs-.jar
item.text: The bundled IANA and IETF MIBs

item.title: snmp6_1.jar
item.text: The Westhawk SNMP stack (only used by MibbleBrowser)

body.p: Mibble is a library, but provides a number of small apps:

item.title: MibbleBrowser.jar
item.text: Contains the MIB browser app and dependencies rolled into a single JAR file. Double-click to launch.

item.title: bin/MibbleBrowser.bat (or .sh)
item.text: An alternative start script for the MIB browser app, using the JAR files from the lib subdirectory.

item.title: bin/MibblePrinter.bat (or .sh)
item.text: Formats (or pretty-prints) one or more MIB files.

item.title: bin/MibbleValidator.bat (or .sh)
item.text: Validates the syntax of one or more MIB files.

body.p: The shell scripts finds the required JAR files automatically via the lib subdirectory and adds them to the CLASSPATH.
